net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_typeAttack
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Updates the roll expression to be a generic attack
The user enters the damage bonus and the attack damage

arg(0) = old action type
arg(1) = Working roll expression witn new action type
arg(2) = latest form input

Outputs html content for all of the action steps currently defined
Returns the updated roll expression
